main event: A brilliant white ball with a tail was seen flying straight from west to northeast for 4 to 5 seconds at Oxnard AFB.
interesting points: The observation lasted for about 4 to 5 seconds., The object was described as a brilliant white ball with a tail., It was reported that the course of the object was 170 DM., The sighting was concluded to possibly be a meteor., The report came from both military and civilian sources.
sighted object: one brilliant white ball with a tail
